name: The Trip (itch) (Reivaj Norbac)
description:
It´s a sunny day. You´re in your car and a robber enters in. 

Drive the robber to her destination while you keep her from bleeding.

Controls

W  - accelerate

S - reverse

A/D - Turn left/right

Espace - brake

A game made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 by only one person

Music: Bensound.com
